author: Simple History
description:
Rome wasn’t built in a day — but how did it all begin? In this first episode of our new series on the Rise and Fall of Rome, we explore its legendary founding, the age of kings, and how a small settlement on the Tiber became the heart of an empire.

We’re trying something new with this episodic format — your feedback means a lot! Let us know what you think in the comments, and join us next time as we uncover the rise of the Roman Republic.

This video was made possible thanks to everyone on the Simple History Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/simplehistory

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
